profileJS_createKeyFromMnemonicAction_64:
We can 't use password longer more than 64 bytes, due bug in scrypt - js
In case you want more stronger password, consider using\ n < Create Account > instead of < Create Mnemonic Account > 
You can find full description here: 
 https: //github.com/ricmoo/scrypt-js/issues/11
